attributes.action: pardon those convicted for being gay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the Prime Minister's apology for the persecution of Alan Turing, we ask for a full legal pardon for the many thousands, including Turing, who were convicted due to a homophobic law.  We may not be able to completely 'put the clock back', but we can clear their names.
